metadata.title: CVE-2021-26813 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: markdown2 >=1.0.1.18, fixed in 2.4.0, is affected by a regular expressiondenial of service vulnerability. If an attacker provides a maliciousstring, it can make markdown2 processing difficult or delayed for anextended period of time.

criterions.comment: python-markdown2 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
